content: I have a weird feeling that I've already asked this, but how do I disable debuginfo tests locally? They all fail for me (presumably some nixos-specific failure mode), so I'd rather just not see them at all when ./x.py test
There's no way to put that in config.toml right now though
Meta note to self: apparently this is a question better fit for #t-compiler/help stream
personally x.py test takes way too long for my patience so I never run it locally lol
I let CI find out if I broke unrelated things, I always use x.py test src/test/rustdoc*
and sometimes even that takes too long and I filter with --test-args intra-link
